definition: "piece of wood" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 90), mirror image of 片[pian4]
classifier for strips of land or bamboo, shops, factories etc/slit bamboo or chopped wood (dialect)
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The big bed was specially made for Yao Ming, the giant basketball player.
sentences.chinese: 這張大牀是爲籃壇巨人姚明特製的。

sentences.english: An old farmer called his sons to his bedside to read them his will.
sentences.chinese: 一個老農夫把兒子們叫到牀前，向他們宣讀遺囑。

sentences.english: Some colleges provide beds that can be lofted on their own.
My friends who got under the bed and under desks were crushed to death …
sentences.chinese: 我的友朋們，這些藏在牀下，桌女下的人皆死了。

sentences.english: SUSAN: I didn't realize anyone was gonna be out here, I just sorta rolled outta bed.
sentences.chinese: 我沒想到外面會有人，我只是裹點什麼起了牀。

sentences.english: Roger went across to the bed and put his hand on her arm.It was cold.
sentences.chinese: 羅傑走到牀前把手放在她的手臂上，屍體已經冷了。

sentences.english: A nursing bed which can disassemble and assemble flexibly and used for paralytic relates to a bed.
sentences.chinese: 可靈活拆裝的癱瘓病人護理牀，它涉及一種牀。

sentences.english: A nursing bed which can disassemble and assemble flexibly and used for paralytic relates to a bed.
sentences.chinese: 可靈活拆裝的癱瘓病人護理牀，它涉及一種牀。

sentences.english: I figured the store would give us guff about exchanging it.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得要想把牀退回去恐怕要費一番脣舌。

sentences.english: It can be used for on-the-spot and bedside treatment.
sentences.chinese: 用於牀旁和基層進行現場搶救治療。

sentences.english: Platform beds or canopies are better choices for smaller rooms.
sentences.chinese: 平臺式牀或帳篷是較小的房間的不錯的選擇。

sentences.english: Backwashing is one of the methods to maintain a filter bed clean.
sentences.chinese: 反衝洗是保持濾牀清潔的方法之一。

sentences.english: It adds some great contrast to the white linens and wardrobes.
sentences.chinese: 和白色的衣櫃和牀形成了對比。

sentences.english: Lo: A king-sized bed sounds great.
Eight is for a nice warm bed.
He is just a dishonest trickster.
sentences.chinese: 牀破只是一個不誠實的騙子。

definition: to land/to touch the ground/also pr. [zhuo2 di4]
hem at the bottom of garment
